globalHeaders._comment: CSP includes 'unsafe-inline' for styles because the existing HTML uses inline styles. Consider refactoring to external styles for stronger security.
globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https:; media-src 'self' https:; connect-src 'self' https:; font-src 'self';
